description: Rich, creamy, and it's totally egg-free and non-dairy! This luscious vegan eggnog is super easy to whip-up and the perfect drink for holiday gatherings!
name: Ultra Creamy Vegan Eggnog
recipeIngredient: 1 cup raw cashews, (soaked in water 4-8 hours, drained and rinsed)
1 cup full-fat coconut milk (from a can)
1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg, (plus more for serving)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the cashews, water, coconut milk, banana, maple syrup, nutmeg, and salt into a blender and blend until smooth.*
Taste-test and make any adjustments as needed. Add the rum or whiskey if using, and pulse the machine again to combine.
Optionally, top with vegan whipped coconut cream and a sprinkle of nutmeg.
